title: Meryl Streep's Reaction to Jimmy Kimmel's 2017 Oscars Call Out Deserves an Award - Meryl Streep at Academy Awards
text: Getty Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Before announcing presenters for the first Oscar of the evening on Sunday, Jimmy Kimmel reserved some precious time to honor Meryl Streep and her record breaking 20th nomination. (She‚Äôs up for Best Actress for Florence Foster Jenkins , in case you‚Äôre only catching up now). To completely embarrass the woman who‚Äôs truly had it all and won it all, Jimmy rallied everyone to honor someone who has ‚Äústood the test of time for her many uninspiring and overrated performances.‚Äù She responded by burying her face into husband Don Gummer‚Äôs shoulder. (We all deserve our own Don Gummer, btw). Giphy | ABC Jimmy continued: ‚ÄúMay I say from her mediocre early work in The Deer Hunter and Out of Africa to her underwhelming performances in Kramer vs. Kramer and Sophie‚Äôs Choice , Meryl Streep has phoned it in for more than 50 films over the course of her lackluster career. This is Meryl‚Äôs 20th Oscar nomination. Maybe even more amazing, considering the fact that she wasn‚Äôt even in a movie this year. We just wrote her name down out of habit.‚Äù be the Meryl you wish to see in the world üôå #oscars pic.twitter.com/z0XSnNrjLp Advertisement - Continue Reading Below He then proceeded to ask Meryl to stand up for a ‚Äútotally undeserved round of applause.‚Äù
